FestivalPlanner.Agenda

Class ArtistManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.Agenda.ArtistManager

  • public class ArtistManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all artists used by Agenda.

    Contains a HashMap with a String containing the name of the artist, and an instance of the object.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArtistManager

        public ArtistManager()
        Empty constructor for the ArtistManager.

        The empty constructor initialises the this.artists HashMap.

      • ArtistManager

        public ArtistManager(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Artist> artists)
        Constructor for the ArtistManager.

        Sets this.artists to the parameter's value.

        Parameters:
        artists - pre-existing HashMap containing Strings and Artists this.artists should be set to

    • Method Detail

      • containsArtist

        public boolean containsArtist(java.lang.String artistName)
        Returns true if the stages HashMap contains the parameter's value. If it does not contain that value it'll return false.
        Parameters:
        artistName - a string representing a possible key for the artists HashMap
        Returns:
        a boolean, which is true of the HashMap contains a key the parameter's value

      • addArtist

        public void addArtist(Artist artist)
        Adds the Artist object to the stages ArrayList if the list doesn't contain the value already.
        Parameters:
        artist - instance of Artist used to check whether the HashMap already contains it or not

      • removeArtist

        public void removeArtist(java.lang.String artistName)
        Removes the Artist object from the artists ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        artistName - String representing the key of the object that should be removed from the HashMap

      • editArtist

        public void editArtist(java.lang.String originalName,
                       Artist editedArtist)
        changes a Artist within PodiumManager to have the same values as the given a Artist.
        Parameters:
        originalName - the name of the Artist you * want to edit
        editedArtist - the new version of the Artist

      • getArtist

        public Artist getArtist(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for an Artist with the given name, returns null if the Artist was not found.
        Parameters:
        name - String representing the name of the Artist that is being requested.
        Returns:
        Artist with the given name, returns null if the Artist was not found

      • getAllArtistNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllArtistNames()
        Returns a Set with all the names of the known Artists.
        Returns:
        Set containing all the names of the known Artists

      • getObservableArtistList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getObservableArtistList()
        Getter with an ObservableList that automatically updates when new Artists are made.
        Returns:
        an ObservableList that automatically updates when new Artists are made.
